fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Inspect: You learn the role of the player who is Executed by the Execution event (True). 
- Records: Learn 3 roles. At least 2 of them are present in this game (Susceptible). [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Autopsy: Choose a dead player, and pick 3 players. Learned if any of them Killed the player.  [2 uses, 3 CD, Astral, Unique]
- Ties: Choose a dead player, and pick a non-revealed player. Learn if they share the same faction as the dead player (Uncertain). [2 uses, 2 CD, Astral]
- Memoriams: Gain a non-special item card of your choice. Gain a use for every 3 players you outlive. [1 use, 1 CD, Recharging, 0/3]
